com.perples.recosdk

Interface RECORangingListener


  • public interface RECORangingListener
    The RECORangingListener interface receives the results when startRangingBeaconsInRegion method is called.

    RECORangingListener 인터페이스는 startRangingBeaconsInRegion 메소드의 실행 시, 결과 값을 전달받기 위한 인터페이스 입니다.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void didRangeBeaconsInRegion(java.util.Collection<RECOBeacon> beacons, RECOBeaconRegion region)
      Method to tell one or more beacons are in range.

    • Method Detail

      • didRangeBeaconsInRegion

        void didRangeBeaconsInRegion(java.util.Collection<RECOBeacon> beacons,
                             RECOBeaconRegion region)
        Method to tell one or more beacons are in range.
        It tells that one or more beacons are in range.
        RECOBeaconManager calls this method after scanning beacons when ranging.

        하나 이상의 beacon이 ranging 되었음을 알려주는 메소드.
        하나 이상의 beacon이 ranging 되었음을 알립니다.
        RECOBeaconManager는 ranging 시에 beacon 스캔 후, 이 메소드를 호출합니다.

        Parameters:
        beacons - Collection of RECOBeacon objects containing beacons currently in range
        region - RECOBeaconRegion object containing the parameters that were used to locate the beacons

        beacons - 해당 region 내에 있는 beacon들을 담고있는 RECOBeacon 객체 collection
        region - beacon들을 ranging 하기 위해 사용된 RECOBeaconRegion 객체
